sentences.en: All that is a lot of shit.
Every piece of shit every man has to eat every day of his life is personal.
sentences.cn: 每个人吃的每顿饭,屙出来的每一堆屎,他一生中的每一天,全都是个人问题.

sentences.en: Everything that journalist writes is a load of shit.
sentences.cn: 那个记者写的东西全是狗屁.

sentences.en: I am so fed up with your bull shit , cut the crap.
sentences.cn: 真是受够了, 废话少说.

sentences.en: I will not give a shit about that!
I'm so fed up with your BS ( bull shit ) .
sentences.cn: 我受够了你的 废话.

sentences.en: It throws shit on all pretensions and fictions.
sentences.cn: 它轻视一切伪装和虚构.
皮洛克是个讨厌的家伙.

sentences.en: Pounding the pencil against the table , she exclaimed,'shit!
sentences.cn: 她把铅笔在桌子上顿, 说: “ 混帐!

sentences.en: The guy at the bottom of the pecking order takes shit from everybody.
sentences.cn: 那个地位最低的家伙必须受每个人的气.

sentences.en: The little kid stepped right in a pile of dog shit.
sentences.cn: 这小孩正好踩在一堆狗屎上.

sentences.en: This is a load of shit.
You do talk a load of shit!
You think they'll want to start over with that baby shit?
sentences.cn: 你觉得他们那时候还想养个小屁孩?

sentences.en: You're back with that piece of shit after what he did, Letty?
sentences.cn: 经历那么多事之后还跟着他, 莱蒂?

phrases.tran_cn: ［用以表示某事极其明显］不是明摆着吗？
使井然有序：使安排有序；把某人的事或东西安排得井然有序
振作起来（以便应付或做成某事）
用来表示对很明显的事情的带有嘲讽的确认
恶劣地对待：带有恶意地或极其不敬地对待

trans.tran_en: used to express anger, annoyance, fear, or disappointment

trans.tran_cn: 粪便，排泄，胡扯，废话，可鄙的人
trans.tran_en: Some people use shit to refer to solid waste matter from the body of a human being or animal
